00065 static unsigned int osd_oi_count = OSD_OI_FID_NR;
00066 module_param(osd_oi_count, int, 0444);
00067 MODULE_PARM_DESC(osd_oi_count, "Number of Object Index containers to be created, it's only valid for new filesystem.");
00068 
00070 static struct mutex oi_init_lock;
00071 
00072 static struct dt_index_features oi_feat = {
00073         .dif_flags       = DT_IND_UPDATE,
00074         .dif_recsize_min = sizeof(struct osd_inode_id),
00075         .dif_recsize_max = sizeof(struct osd_inode_id),
00076         .dif_ptrsize     = 4
00077 };
00078 
00079 #define OSD_OI_NAME_BASE        "oi.16"
00080 
00081 static void osd_oi_table_put(struct osd_thread_info *info,
00082                              struct osd_oi **oi_table, unsigned oi_count)
00083 {
00084         struct iam_container *bag;
00085         int                   i;
00086 
00087         for (i = 0; i < oi_count; i++) {
00088                 if (oi_table[i] == NULL)
00089                         continue;
00090 
00091                 LASSERT(oi_table[i]->oi_inode != NULL);
00092 
00093                 bag = &(oi_table[i]->oi_dir.od_container);
00094                 if (bag->ic_object == oi_table[i]->oi_inode)
00095                         iam_container_fini(bag);
00096                 iput(oi_table[i]->oi_inode);
00097                 oi_table[i]->oi_inode = NULL;
00098                 OBD_FREE_PTR(oi_table[i]);
00099                 oi_table[i] = NULL;
00100         }
00101 }
00102 
00103 static int osd_oi_index_create_one(struct osd_thread_info *info,
00104                                    struct osd_device *osd, const char *name,
00105                                    struct dt_index_features *feat)
00106 {
00107         const struct lu_env             *env = info->oti_env;
00108         struct osd_inode_id             *id  = &info->oti_id;
00109         struct buffer_head              *bh;
00110         struct inode                    *inode;
00111         struct ldiskfs_dir_entry_2      *de;
00112         struct dentry                   *dentry;
00113         struct super_block              *sb  = osd_sb(osd);
00114         struct inode                    *dir = sb->s_root->d_inode;
00115         handle_t                        *jh;
00116         int                              rc;
00117 
00118         dentry = osd_child_dentry_by_inode(env, dir, name, strlen(name));
00119         bh = osd_ldiskfs_find_entry(dir, &dentry->d_name, &de, NULL, NULL);
00120         if (bh) {
00121                 osd_id_gen(id, le32_to_cpu(de->inode), OSD_OII_NOGEN);
00122                 brelse(bh);
00123                 inode = osd_iget(info, osd, id);
00124                 if (!IS_ERR(inode)) {
00125                         iput(inode);
00126                         inode = ERR_PTR(-EEXIST);
00127                 }
00128                 return PTR_ERR(inode);
00129         }
00130 
00131         jh = osd_journal_start_sb(sb, LDISKFS_HT_MISC, 100);
00132         if (IS_ERR(jh))
00133                 return PTR_ERR(jh);
00134 
00135         inode = ldiskfs_create_inode(jh, dir, (S_IFREG | S_IRUGO | S_IWUSR));
00136         if (IS_ERR(inode)) {
00137                 ldiskfs_journal_stop(jh);
00138                 return PTR_ERR(inode);
00139         }
00140 
00141         ldiskfs_set_inode_state(inode, LDISKFS_STATE_LUSTRE_NOSCRUB);
00142         unlock_new_inode(inode);
00143 
00144         if (feat->dif_flags & DT_IND_VARKEY)
00145                 rc = iam_lvar_create(inode, feat->dif_keysize_max,
00146                                      feat->dif_ptrsize, feat->dif_recsize_max,
00147                                      jh);
00148         else
00149                 rc = iam_lfix_create(inode, feat->dif_keysize_max,
00150                                      feat->dif_ptrsize, feat->dif_recsize_max,
00151                                      jh);
00152         dentry = osd_child_dentry_by_inode(env, dir, name, strlen(name));
00153         rc = osd_ldiskfs_add_entry(info, jh, dentry, inode, NULL);
00154         ldiskfs_journal_stop(jh);
00155         iput(inode);
00156         return rc;
00157 }
00158 
00159 static struct inode *osd_oi_index_open(struct osd_thread_info *info,
00160                                        struct osd_device *osd,
00161                                        const char *name,
00162                                        struct dt_index_features *f,
00163                                        bool create)
00164 {
00165         struct dentry *dentry;
00166         struct inode  *inode;
00167         int            rc;
00168 
00169         dentry = ll_lookup_one_len(name, osd_sb(osd)->s_root, strlen(name));
00170         if (IS_ERR(dentry))
00171                 return (void *) dentry;
00172 
00173         if (dentry->d_inode) {
00174                 LASSERT(!is_bad_inode(dentry->d_inode));
00175                 inode = dentry->d_inode;
00176                 atomic_inc(&inode->i_count);
00177                 dput(dentry);
00178                 return inode;
00179         }
00180 
00181         /* create */
00182         dput(dentry);
00183         shrink_dcache_parent(osd_sb(osd)->s_root);
00184         if (!create)
00185                 return ERR_PTR(-ENOENT);
00186 
00187         rc = osd_oi_index_create_one(info, osd, name, f);
00188         if (rc)
00189                 return ERR_PTR(rc);
00190 
00191         dentry = ll_lookup_one_len(name, osd_sb(osd)->s_root, strlen(name));
00192         if (IS_ERR(dentry))
00193                 return (void *) dentry;
00194 
00195         if (dentry->d_inode) {
00196                 LASSERT(!is_bad_inode(dentry->d_inode));
00197                 inode = dentry->d_inode;
00198                 atomic_inc(&inode->i_count);
00199                 dput(dentry);
00200                 return inode;
00201         }
00202 
00203         return ERR_PTR(-ENOENT);
00204 }
00205 
00215 static int osd_oi_open(struct osd_thread_info *info, struct osd_device *osd,
00216                        char *name, struct osd_oi **oi_slot, bool create)
00217 {
00218         struct osd_directory *dir;
00219         struct iam_container *bag;
00220         struct inode         *inode;
00221         struct osd_oi        *oi;
00222         int                   rc;
00223 
00224         ENTRY;
00225 
00226         oi_feat.dif_keysize_min = sizeof(struct lu_fid);
00227         oi_feat.dif_keysize_max = sizeof(struct lu_fid);
00228 
00229         inode = osd_oi_index_open(info, osd, name, &oi_feat, create);
00230         if (IS_ERR(inode))
00231                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(inode));
00232 
00233         /* 'What the @fid is' is not imporatant, because these objects
00234          * have no OI mappings, and only are visible inside the OSD.*/
00235         lu_igif_build(&info->oti_fid, inode->i_ino, inode->i_generation);
00236         rc = osd_ea_fid_set(info, inode, &info->oti_fid, LMAC_NOT_IN_OI, 0);
00237         if (rc != 0)
00238                 GOTO(out_inode, rc);
00239 
00240         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(oi);
00241         if (oi == NULL)
00242                 GOTO(out_inode, rc = -ENOMEM);
00243 
00244         oi->oi_inode = inode;
00245         dir = &oi->oi_dir;
00246 
00247         bag = &dir->od_container;
00248         rc = iam_container_init(bag, &dir->od_descr, inode);
00249         if (rc < 0)
00250                 GOTO(out_free, rc);
00251 
00252         rc = iam_container_setup(bag);
00253         if (rc < 0)
00254                 GOTO(out_container, rc);
00255 
00256         *oi_slot = oi;
00257         RETURN(0);
00258 
00259 out_container:
00260         iam_container_fini(bag);
00261 out_free:
00262         OBD_FREE_PTR(oi);
00263 out_inode:
00264         iput(inode);
00265         return rc;
00266 }
00267 
00285 static int
00286 osd_oi_table_open(struct osd_thread_info *info, struct osd_device *osd,
00287                   struct osd_oi **oi_table, unsigned oi_count, bool create)
00288 {
00289         struct scrub_file *sf = &osd->od_scrub.os_file;
00290         int                count = 0;
00291         int                rc = 0;
00292         int                i;
00293         ENTRY;
00294 
00295         /* NB: oi_count != 0 means that we have already created/known all OIs
00296          * and have known exact number of OIs. */
00297         LASSERT(oi_count <= OSD_OI_FID_NR_MAX);
00298 
00299         for (i = 0; i < (oi_count != 0 ? oi_count : OSD_OI_FID_NR_MAX); i++) {
00300                 char name[12];
00301 
00302                 if (oi_table[i] != NULL) {
00303                         count++;
00304                         continue;
00305                 }
00306 
00307                 sprintf(name, "%s.%d", OSD_OI_NAME_BASE, i);
00308                 rc = osd_oi_open(info, osd, name, &oi_table[i], create);
00309                 if (rc == 0) {
00310                         count++;
00311                         continue;
00312                 }
00313 
00314                 if (rc == -ENOENT && create == false) {
00315                         if (oi_count == 0)
00316                                 return count;
00317 
00318                         rc = 0;
00319                         ldiskfs_set_bit(i, sf->sf_oi_bitmap);
00320                         continue;
00321                 }
00322 
00323                 CERROR("%.16s: can't open %s: rc = %d\n",
00324                        LDISKFS_SB(osd_sb(osd))->s_es->s_volume_name, name, rc);
00325                 if (oi_count > 0)
00326                         CERROR("%.16s: expect to open total %d OI files.\n",
00327                                LDISKFS_SB(osd_sb(osd))->s_es->s_volume_name,
00328                                oi_count);
00329                 break;
00330         }
00331 
00332         if (rc < 0) {
00333                 osd_oi_table_put(info, oi_table, oi_count > 0 ? oi_count : i);
00334                 count = rc;
00335         }
00336 
00337         RETURN(count);
00338 }
00339 
00340 static int osd_remove_oi_one(struct dentry *parent, const char *name,
00341                              int namelen)
00342 {
00343         struct dentry *child;
00344         int rc;
00345 
00346         child = ll_lookup_one_len(name, parent, namelen);
00347         if (IS_ERR(child)) {
00348                 rc = PTR_ERR(child);
00349         } else {
00350                 rc = ll_vfs_unlink(parent->d_inode, child);
00351                 dput(child);
00352         }
00353 
00354         return rc == -ENOENT ? 0 : rc;
00355 }
00356 
00357 static int osd_remove_ois(struct osd_thread_info *info, struct osd_device *osd)
00358 {
00359         char name[16];
00360         int namelen;
00361         int rc;
00362         int i;
00363 
00364         for (i = 0; i < osd->od_scrub.os_file.sf_oi_count; i++) {
00365                 namelen = snprintf(name, sizeof(name), "%s.%d",
00366                                    OSD_OI_NAME_BASE, i);
00367                 rc = osd_remove_oi_one(osd_sb(osd)->s_root, name, namelen);
00368                 if (rc != 0) {
00369                         CERROR("%.16s: fail to remove the stale OI file %s: "
00370                                "rc = %d\n",
00371                                LDISKFS_SB(osd_sb(osd))->s_es->s_volume_name,
00372                                name, rc);
00373                         return rc;
00374                 }
00375         }
00376 
00377         namelen = snprintf(name, sizeof(name), "%s", OSD_OI_NAME_BASE);
00378         rc = osd_remove_oi_one(osd_sb(osd)->s_root, name, namelen);
00379         if (rc != 0)
00380                 CERROR("%.16s: fail to remove the stale OI file %s: rc = %d\n",
00381                        LDISKFS_SB(osd_sb(osd))->s_es->s_volume_name, name, rc);
00382 
00383         return rc;
00384 }
00385 
00386 int osd_oi_init(struct osd_thread_info *info, struct osd_device *osd,
00387                 bool restored)
00388 {
00389         struct osd_scrub  *scrub = &osd->od_scrub;
00390         struct scrub_file *sf = &scrub->os_file;
00391         struct osd_oi    **oi;
00392         int                rc;
00393         ENTRY;
00394 
00395         if (restored) {
00396                 rc = osd_remove_ois(info, osd);
00397                 if (rc != 0)
00398                         return rc;
00399         }
00400 
00401         OBD_ALLOC(oi, sizeof(*oi) * OSD_OI_FID_NR_MAX);
00402         if (oi == NULL)
00403                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00404 
00405         mutex_lock(&oi_init_lock);
00406         /* try to open existing multiple OIs first */
00407         rc = osd_oi_table_open(info, osd, oi, sf->sf_oi_count, false);
00408         if (rc < 0)
00409                 GOTO(out, rc);
00410 
00411         if (rc > 0) {
00412                 if (rc == sf->sf_oi_count || sf->sf_oi_count == 0)
00413                         GOTO(out, rc);
00414 
00415                 osd_scrub_file_reset(scrub,
00416                                      LDISKFS_SB(osd_sb(osd))->s_es->s_uuid,
00417                                      SF_RECREATED);
00418                 osd_oi_count = sf->sf_oi_count;
00419                 goto create;
00420         }
00421 
00422         /* if previous failed then try found single OI from old filesystem */
00423         rc = osd_oi_open(info, osd, OSD_OI_NAME_BASE, &oi[0], false);
00424         if (rc == 0) { /* found single OI from old filesystem */
00425                 ldiskfs_clear_bit(0, sf->sf_oi_bitmap);
00426                 if (sf->sf_success_count == 0)
00427                         /* XXX: There is one corner case that if the OI_scrub
00428                          *      file crashed or lost and we regard it upgrade,
00429                          *      then we allow IGIF lookup to bypass OI files.
00430                          *
00431                          *      The risk is that osd_fid_lookup() may found
00432                          *      a wrong inode with the given IGIF especially
00433                          *      when the MDT has performed file-level backup
00434                          *      and restored after former upgrading from 1.8
00435                          *      to 2.x. Fortunately, the osd_fid_lookup()can
00436                          *      verify the inode to decrease the risk. */
00437                         osd_scrub_file_reset(scrub,
00438                                         LDISKFS_SB(osd_sb(osd))->s_es->s_uuid,
00439                                         SF_UPGRADE);
00440                 GOTO(out, rc = 1);
00441         } else if (rc != -ENOENT) {
00442                 CERROR("%.16s: can't open %s: rc = %d\n",
00443                        LDISKFS_SB(osd_sb(osd))->s_es->s_volume_name,
00444                        OSD_OI_NAME_BASE, rc);
00445                 GOTO(out, rc);
00446         }
00447 
00448         if (sf->sf_oi_count > 0) {
00449                 int i;
00450 
00451                 memset(sf->sf_oi_bitmap, 0, SCRUB_OI_BITMAP_SIZE);
00452                 for (i = 0; i < osd_oi_count; i++)
00453                         ldiskfs_set_bit(i, sf->sf_oi_bitmap);
00454                 osd_scrub_file_reset(scrub,
00455                                      LDISKFS_SB(osd_sb(osd))->s_es->s_uuid,
00456                                      SF_RECREATED);
00457         }
00458         sf->sf_oi_count = osd_oi_count;
00459 
00460 create:
00461         rc = osd_scrub_file_store(scrub);
00462         if (rc < 0) {
00463                 osd_oi_table_put(info, oi, sf->sf_oi_count);
00464                 GOTO(out, rc);
00465         }
00466 
00467         /* No OIs exist, new filesystem, create OI objects */
00468         rc = osd_oi_table_open(info, osd, oi, osd_oi_count, true);
00469         LASSERT(ergo(rc >= 0, rc == osd_oi_count));
00470 
00471         GOTO(out, rc);
00472 
00473 out:
00474         if (rc < 0) {
00475                 OBD_FREE(oi, sizeof(*oi) * OSD_OI_FID_NR_MAX);
00476         } else {
00477                 LASSERT((rc & (rc - 1)) == 0);
00478                 osd->od_oi_table = oi;
00479                 osd->od_oi_count = rc;
00480                 if (sf->sf_oi_count != rc) {
00481                         sf->sf_oi_count = rc;
00482                         rc = osd_scrub_file_store(scrub);
00483                         if (rc < 0) {
00484                                 osd_oi_table_put(info, oi, sf->sf_oi_count);
00485                                 OBD_FREE(oi, sizeof(*oi) * OSD_OI_FID_NR_MAX);
00486                         }
00487                 } else {
00488                         rc = 0;
00489                 }
00490         }
00491 
00492         mutex_unlock(&oi_init_lock);
00493         return rc;
00494 }
00495 
00496 void osd_oi_fini(struct osd_thread_info *info, struct osd_device *osd)
00497 {
00498         if (unlikely(osd->od_oi_table == NULL))
00499                 return;
00500 
00501         osd_oi_table_put(info, osd->od_oi_table, osd->od_oi_count);
00502 
00503         OBD_FREE(osd->od_oi_table,
00504                  sizeof(*(osd->od_oi_table)) * OSD_OI_FID_NR_MAX);
00505         osd->od_oi_table = NULL;
00506 }
00507 
00508 static inline int fid_is_fs_root(const struct lu_fid *fid)
00509 {
00510         /* Map root inode to special local object FID */
00511         return (unlikely(fid_seq(fid) == FID_SEQ_LOCAL_FILE &&
00512                          fid_oid(fid) == OSD_FS_ROOT_OID));
00513 }
00514 
00515 static int osd_oi_iam_lookup(struct osd_thread_info *oti,
00516                              struct osd_oi *oi, struct dt_rec *rec,
00517                              const struct dt_key *key)
00518 {
00519         struct iam_container  *bag;
00520         struct iam_iterator   *it = &oti->oti_idx_it;
00521         struct iam_path_descr *ipd;
00522         int                    rc;
00523         ENTRY;
00524 
00525         LASSERT(oi);
00526         LASSERT(oi->oi_inode);
00527 
00528         bag = &oi->oi_dir.od_container;
00529         ipd = osd_idx_ipd_get(oti->oti_env, bag);
00530         if (IS_ERR(ipd))
00531                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00532 
00533         /* got ipd now we can start iterator. */
00534         iam_it_init(it, bag, 0, ipd);
00535 
00536         rc = iam_it_get(it, (struct iam_key *)key);
00537         if (rc > 0)
00538                 iam_reccpy(&it->ii_path.ip_leaf, (struct iam_rec *)rec);
00539         iam_it_put(it);
00540         iam_it_fini(it);
00541         osd_ipd_put(oti->oti_env, bag, ipd);
00542 
00543         LINVRNT(osd_invariant(obj));
00544 
00545         RETURN(rc);
00546 }
00547 
00548 int fid_is_on_ost(struct osd_thread_info *info, struct osd_device *osd,
00549                   const struct lu_fid *fid, enum oi_check_flags flags)
00550 {
00551         struct lu_seq_range     *range = &info->oti_seq_range;
00552         int                     rc;
00553         ENTRY;
00554 
00555         if (flags & OI_KNOWN_ON_OST)
00556                 RETURN(1);
00557 
00558         if (unlikely(fid_is_local_file(fid) || fid_is_igif(fid) ||
00559                      fid_is_llog(fid)) || fid_is_name_llog(fid) ||
00560                      fid_is_quota(fid))
00561                 RETURN(0);
00562 
00563         if (fid_is_idif(fid) || fid_is_last_id(fid))
00564                 RETURN(1);
00565 
00566         if (!(flags & OI_CHECK_FLD))
00567                 RETURN(0);
00568 
00569         if (osd_seq_site(osd)->ss_server_fld == NULL)
00570                 RETURN(0);
00571 
00572         rc = osd_fld_lookup(info->oti_env, osd, fid_seq(fid), range);
00573         if (rc != 0) {
00574                 if (rc != -ENOENT)
00575                         CERROR("%s: lookup FLD "DFID": rc = %d\n",
00576                                osd_name(osd), PFID(fid), rc);
00577                 RETURN(0);
00578         }
00579 
00580         if (fld_range_is_ost(range))
00581                 RETURN(1);
00582 
00583         RETURN(0);
00584 }
00585 
00586 static int __osd_oi_lookup(struct osd_thread_info *info, struct osd_device *osd,
00587                            const struct lu_fid *fid, struct osd_inode_id *id)
00588 {
00589         struct lu_fid *oi_fid = &info->oti_fid2;
00590         int            rc;
00591 
00592         fid_cpu_to_be(oi_fid, fid);
00593         rc = osd_oi_iam_lookup(info, osd_fid2oi(osd, fid), (struct dt_rec *)id,
00594                                (const struct dt_key *)oi_fid);
00595         if (rc > 0) {
00596                 osd_id_unpack(id, id);
00597                 rc = 0;
00598         } else if (rc == 0) {
00599                 rc = -ENOENT;
00600         }
00601         return rc;
00602 }
00603 
00604 int osd_oi_lookup(struct osd_thread_info *info, struct osd_device *osd,
00605                   const struct lu_fid *fid, struct osd_inode_id *id,
00606                   enum oi_check_flags flags)
00607 {
00608         if (unlikely(fid_is_last_id(fid)))
00609                 return osd_obj_spec_lookup(info, osd, fid, id);
00610 
00611         if (fid_is_on_ost(info, osd, fid, flags) || fid_is_llog(fid))
00612                 return osd_obj_map_lookup(info, osd, fid, id);
00613 
00614 
00615         if (unlikely(fid_seq(fid) == FID_SEQ_LOCAL_FILE)) {
00616                 int rc;
00617                 if (fid_is_fs_root(fid)) {
00618                         osd_id_gen(id, osd_sb(osd)->s_root->d_inode->i_ino,
00619                                    osd_sb(osd)->s_root->d_inode->i_generation);
00620                         return 0;
00621                 }
00622                 if (unlikely(fid_is_acct(fid)))
00623                         return osd_acct_obj_lookup(info, osd, fid, id);
00624 
00625                 /* For other special FIDs, try OI first, then do spec lookup */
00626                 rc = __osd_oi_lookup(info, osd, fid, id);
00627                 if (rc == -ENOENT)
00628                         return osd_obj_spec_lookup(info, osd, fid, id);
00629                 return rc;
00630         }
00631 
00632         if (!osd->od_igif_inoi && fid_is_igif(fid)) {
00633                 osd_id_gen(id, lu_igif_ino(fid), lu_igif_gen(fid));
00634                 return 0;
00635         }
00636 
00637         return __osd_oi_lookup(info, osd, fid, id);
00638 }
00639 
00640 static int osd_oi_iam_refresh(struct osd_thread_info *oti, struct osd_oi *oi,
00641                              const struct dt_rec *rec, const struct dt_key *key,
00642                              handle_t *th, bool insert)
00643 {
00644         struct iam_container    *bag;
00645         struct iam_path_descr   *ipd;
00646         int                     rc;
00647         ENTRY;
00648 
00649         LASSERT(oi);
00650         LASSERT(oi->oi_inode);
00651         ll_vfs_dq_init(oi->oi_inode);
00652 
00653         bag = &oi->oi_dir.od_container;
00654         ipd = osd_idx_ipd_get(oti->oti_env, bag);
00655         if (unlikely(ipd == NULL))
00656                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00657 
00658         LASSERT(th != NULL);
00659         LASSERT(th->h_transaction != NULL);
00660         if (insert)
00661                 rc = iam_insert(th, bag, (const struct iam_key *)key,
00662                                 (const struct iam_rec *)rec, ipd);
00663         else
00664                 rc = iam_update(th, bag, (const struct iam_key *)key,
00665                                 (const struct iam_rec *)rec, ipd);
00666         osd_ipd_put(oti->oti_env, bag, ipd);
00667         LINVRNT(osd_invariant(obj));
00668         RETURN(rc);
00669 }
00670 
00671 int osd_oi_insert(struct osd_thread_info *info, struct osd_device *osd,
00672                   const struct lu_fid *fid, const struct osd_inode_id *id,
00673                   handle_t *th, enum oi_check_flags flags)
00674 {
00675         struct lu_fid       *oi_fid = &info->oti_fid2;
00676         struct osd_inode_id *oi_id  = &info->oti_id2;
00677         int                  rc     = 0;
00678 
00679         if (unlikely(fid_is_last_id(fid)))
00680                 return osd_obj_spec_insert(info, osd, fid, id, th);
00681 
00682         if (fid_is_on_ost(info, osd, fid, flags) || fid_is_llog(fid))
00683                 return osd_obj_map_insert(info, osd, fid, id, th);
00684 
00685         fid_cpu_to_be(oi_fid, fid);
00686         osd_id_pack(oi_id, id);
00687         rc = osd_oi_iam_refresh(info, osd_fid2oi(osd, fid),
00688                                (const struct dt_rec *)oi_id,
00689                                (const struct dt_key *)oi_fid, th, true);
00690         if (rc != 0) {
00691                 struct inode *inode;
00692                 struct lustre_mdt_attrs *lma = &info->oti_mdt_attrs;
00693 
00694                 if (rc != -EEXIST)
00695                         return rc;
00696 
00697                 rc = osd_oi_lookup(info, osd, fid, oi_id, 0);
00698                 if (rc != 0)
00699                         return rc;
00700 
00701                 if (unlikely(osd_id_eq(id, oi_id)))
00702                         return 1;
00703 
00704                 /* Check whether the mapping for oi_id is valid or not. */
00705                 inode = osd_iget(info, osd, oi_id);
00706                 if (IS_ERR(inode)) {
00707                         rc = PTR_ERR(inode);
00708                         if (rc == -ENOENT || rc == -ESTALE)
00709                                 goto update;
00710                         return rc;
00711                 }
00712 
00713                 /* The EA inode should NOT be in OI, old OI scrub may added
00714                  * such OI mapping by wrong, replace it. */
00715                 if (unlikely(osd_is_ea_inode(inode))) {
00716                         iput(inode);
00717                         goto update;
00718                 }
00719 
00720                 rc = osd_get_lma(info, inode, &info->oti_obj_dentry, lma);
00721                 iput(inode);
00722                 if (rc == -ENODATA)
00723                         goto update;
00724 
00725                 if (rc != 0)
00726                         return rc;
00727 
00728                 if (!(lma->lma_compat & LMAC_NOT_IN_OI) &&
00729                     lu_fid_eq(fid, &lma->lma_self_fid)) {
00730                         CERROR("%.16s: the FID "DFID" is used by two objects: "
00731                                "%u/%u %u/%u\n",
00732                                LDISKFS_SB(osd_sb(osd))->s_es->s_volume_name,
00733                                PFID(fid), oi_id->oii_ino, oi_id->oii_gen,
00734                                id->oii_ino, id->oii_gen);
00735                         return -EEXIST;
00736                 }
00737 
00738 update:
00739                 osd_id_pack(oi_id, id);
00740                 rc = osd_oi_iam_refresh(info, osd_fid2oi(osd, fid),
00741                                         (const struct dt_rec *)oi_id,
00742                                         (const struct dt_key *)oi_fid, th, false);
00743                 if (rc != 0)
00744                         return rc;
00745         }
00746 
00747         if (unlikely(fid_seq(fid) == FID_SEQ_LOCAL_FILE))
00748                 rc = osd_obj_spec_insert(info, osd, fid, id, th);
00749         return rc;
00750 }
00751 
00752 static int osd_oi_iam_delete(struct osd_thread_info *oti, struct osd_oi *oi,
00753                              const struct dt_key *key, handle_t *th)
00754 {
00755         struct iam_container    *bag;
00756         struct iam_path_descr   *ipd;
00757         int                      rc;
00758         ENTRY;
00759 
00760         LASSERT(oi);
00761         LASSERT(oi->oi_inode);
00762         ll_vfs_dq_init(oi->oi_inode);
00763 
00764         bag = &oi->oi_dir.od_container;
00765         ipd = osd_idx_ipd_get(oti->oti_env, bag);
00766         if (unlikely(ipd == NULL))
00767                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00768 
00769         LASSERT(th != NULL);
00770         LASSERT(th->h_transaction != NULL);
00771 
00772         rc = iam_delete(th, bag, (const struct iam_key *)key, ipd);
00773         osd_ipd_put(oti->oti_env, bag, ipd);
00774         LINVRNT(osd_invariant(obj));
00775         RETURN(rc);
00776 }
00777 
00778 int osd_oi_delete(struct osd_thread_info *info,
00779                   struct osd_device *osd, const struct lu_fid *fid,
00780                   handle_t *th, enum oi_check_flags flags)
00781 {
00782         struct lu_fid *oi_fid = &info->oti_fid2;
00783 
00784         /* clear idmap cache */
00785         if (lu_fid_eq(fid, &info->oti_cache.oic_fid))
00786                 fid_zero(&info->oti_cache.oic_fid);
00787 
00788         if (fid_is_last_id(fid))
00789                 return 0;
00790 
00791         if (fid_is_on_ost(info, osd, fid, flags) || fid_is_llog(fid))
00792                 return osd_obj_map_delete(info, osd, fid, th);
00793 
00794         fid_cpu_to_be(oi_fid, fid);
00795         return osd_oi_iam_delete(info, osd_fid2oi(osd, fid),
00796                                  (const struct dt_key *)oi_fid, th);
00797 }
00798 
00799 int osd_oi_update(struct osd_thread_info *info, struct osd_device *osd,
00800                   const struct lu_fid *fid, const struct osd_inode_id *id,
00801                   handle_t *th, enum oi_check_flags flags)
00802 {
00803         struct lu_fid       *oi_fid = &info->oti_fid2;
00804         struct osd_inode_id *oi_id  = &info->oti_id2;
00805         int                  rc     = 0;
00806 
00807         if (unlikely(fid_is_last_id(fid)))
00808                 return osd_obj_spec_update(info, osd, fid, id, th);
00809 
00810         if (fid_is_on_ost(info, osd, fid, flags) || fid_is_llog(fid))
00811                 return osd_obj_map_update(info, osd, fid, id, th);
00812 
00813         fid_cpu_to_be(oi_fid, fid);
00814         osd_id_pack(oi_id, id);
00815         rc = osd_oi_iam_refresh(info, osd_fid2oi(osd, fid),
00816                                (const struct dt_rec *)oi_id,
00817                                (const struct dt_key *)oi_fid, th, false);
00818         if (rc != 0)
00819                 return rc;
00820 
00821         if (unlikely(fid_seq(fid) == FID_SEQ_LOCAL_FILE))
00822                 rc = osd_obj_spec_update(info, osd, fid, id, th);
00823         return rc;
00824 }
00825 
00826 int osd_oi_mod_init(void)
00827 {
00828         if (osd_oi_count == 0 || osd_oi_count > OSD_OI_FID_NR_MAX)
00829                 osd_oi_count = OSD_OI_FID_NR;
00830 
00831         if ((osd_oi_count & (osd_oi_count - 1)) != 0) {
00832                 LCONSOLE_WARN("Round up oi_count %d to power2 %d\n",
00833                               osd_oi_count, size_roundup_power2(osd_oi_count));
00834                 osd_oi_count = size_roundup_power2(osd_oi_count);
00835         }
00836 
00837         mutex_init(&oi_init_lock);
00838         return 0;
00839 }
